alert.note: Alert for York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mecklenburg and northeastern York Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Uptown Charlotte, or near Carowinds, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Uptown Charlotte, Central Charlotte, Southwest Charlotte, Pineville, Freedom Park, Charlotte Douglas Airport, Steele Creek, Carowinds, Southpark Mall and Paw Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
